action.action-desc: Mr. Biggs (for himself, Mr. Crenshaw, Mr. Murphy of North Carolina, Mr. Gosar, Mr. Fitzpatrick, and Mr. Buck) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to furnish hyperbaric oxygen therapy to veterans with traumatic brain injury or post-traumatic stress disorder.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the TBI and PTSD Treatment Act.

section.header: Hyperbaric oxygen therapy for veterans with traumatic brain injury or post-traumatic stress disorder

subsection.text: Chapter 17 of title 38, United States Code, is amended by inserting after section 1710E the following new section:

section.header: Traumatic brain injury and post-traumatic stress disorder: hyperbaric oxygen therapy

subsection.text: The Secretary shall furnish hyperbaric oxygen therapy to a veteran who has a condition specified in subsection (b) through a health care provider described in section 1703(c)(5) of this title.
The conditions specified in this subsection are the following:
The table of sections at the beginning of such chapter is amended by inserting after the item relating to section 1710E the following new item:

toc.toc-entry: 1710F. Traumatic brain injury and post-traumatic stress disorder: hyperbaric oxygen therapy.
